item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Fig 1: Vinayak Chittora, near the nature


LinkedinIn
Github
StackOverflow
Leetcode
HackerRank
Diligent software engineer and a recent computer science graduate with over 8 months of hands-on experience in web applications. Eager to get new opportunities and work on large scale projects. Skilled in developing plans, managing projects, and code documentation. Currently working on NodeJS and React and leaning Deployment for a good future.
I like to explore about databases and networks. My hobbies are surfing on web and listening music. I put experience above knowledge.

I started my programming journey during my studies at Rajasthan Technical University, Kota, where I developed a strong interest in problem-solving and algorithms. My initial work involved frontend web development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and jQuery, during an internship at Bit to Byte Robotics. I later transitioned into full-stack development and am currently working at Wisflux Tech Labs in Jaipur, where I focus on building scalable applications using React, NestJS, PostgreSQL, and Sequelize. My role here has deepened my understanding of both frontend and backend technologies, as well as database management.
Throughout this journey, I’ve expanded my skill set to include JavaScript and TypeScript as my main programming languages. I've also gained experience with Java and DevOps tools like Docker, Redis, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions. Exploring Angular and advancing my knowledge of Java have further broadened my technical capabilities.
Alongside my professional work, I’ve taken on various web development projects, honing my expertise in JavaScript frameworks and cloud-native technologies. I'm continuously learning and am excited to apply these skills in real-world scenarios, especially in areas like full-stack development and database engineering. I'm enthusiastic about joining teams that prioritize innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.



Thanks for reading!
